document_data.name: Mavin's Worldweave
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mavin's worldweave''''', sometimes simply called '''''worldweave''''',<ref> was a powerful [[arcanist]] spell of the [[inventive]] school that permanently modified the climate in a region.
document_data.Effects:
With this spell, an [[archwizard]] could alter the climate of a circular area {{SI|35|mi|k|long=yes}} in radius (even larger for more experienced casters).The area of effect is a reasonable assumption given that the source specifies it as "one mile/lvl" and it takes an arcanist of 35{{th}} level to cast this spell. The reader is free to interpret this as they see fit. The caster could target the center of the spell at any point within their field of view. One casting of the spell modified the climate one step on the following spectrum: 
Arctic ⇔ Subarctic ⇔ Temperate ⇔ Subtropic ⇔ Tropic
Additional steps required additional castings of the spell.
document_data.Components: ''Mavin's worldweave'' required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[material component]]s, but the details have been lost to history.<ref group="note">That is, the source neglected to mention them.
document_data.History: This spell was invented by the arcanist [[Mavin]] in the {{YearlinkName|-654}} ([[Netheril]] year 3205). It was used extensively on the northern border of Netheril to modify the subarctic climate to something more temperate.
